pinyin: Qi3 li4 ma3 zha1 luo2 shan1

definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
to prick/to run or stick (a needle etc) into/jug (a classifier for liquids such as beer)
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Amboseli sits on the lower slopes of mighty Mount Kilimanjaro - Africa's highest - whose peak lies across the border in Tanzania.
sentences.chinese: 安博西利位於非洲最頂峯乞力馬扎羅山的緩坡面。

sentences.english: Back on the mainland, take a bus to Moshi at the foot of Kilimanjaro.
sentences.chinese: 回到大陸，搭乘巴士去乞力馬扎羅山腳下的莫希。
她還攀登了乞力馬扎羅山。
